exclusion.criterion: Associated condition of the colon or rectum (cancer, IBD, polyps)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient unable to communicate in French, English or German
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 70 year-old woman with a history of CAD recently noted abdominal mass who presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. Over the last few weeks leading up to admission, she has been experiencing mid-abdominal pain, radiating to the left flank.
